channel.title: Bash on Reminders for Future Me
channel.description: Recent content in Bash on Reminders for Future Me

item.title: Bash Script for Edition and Exporting of an Org-mode Template
item.description: I have an org-mode template of a document. I have to edit some information in it, and export it to text and then to pdf. I do it with a bash script

item.title: Automating RMarkdown Rendering and PDF Merging with Bash
item.description: I used bash to automate the rendering of hundreds of Rmarkdown files and the merging of the resulting PDFs
